attributes.action: Give the police the proper funding they need!
attributes.background:
Petition to help the police have more success in their job.

They're underfunded and underpaid, the government needs to put more money into the policing system.

It will give them better training and the pay they deserve!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Fund pay rise for police officers in line with inflation, plus 1%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614869

Fund increase in police officers in line with population: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/618553
